english.segment1: There's a place that I love to run and play. There's a place that I sing new songs of praise
english.segment2: Dancin' with my Father God in fields of grace
english.segment3: There's a place that I lose myself within. There's a place that I find myself again
english.segment4: Dancin' with my Father God in fields of grace
english.segment5: There's a place where religion finally dies. There's a place that I lose my selfish pride
english.segment6: Dancin' with my Father God in fields of grace
english.segment7: I love my Father, my Father loves me. I dance for my Father, my Father sings over me
english.segment8: And nothing can take that away from me
